summary: Dream Browser - Dream Browser is a brand new decentralised browser. Built to be a haven for traders, Dream is complete with integrated extensions such as AI chat, our own wallet system, and AI chart analysis. At the core of the browser lies $DREAM token, gain rewards for searching and use our swap to turn $DREAM into any holdings. Holders of $DREAM token benefit from advertising revenue share, and all future developments will be built around our token as a base.
